title.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Jan. 27, 1926. [Archer Avenue Church Elects Candidates for Pastor]

div.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Jan. 27, 1926. [ARCHER AVENUE CHURCH ELECTS CANDIDATES FOR PASTOR]

body.p: At the last held consistory meeting of the Archer Avenue Reformed Church of Chicago, the following candidates for pastor of this church were named: Rev. Carl Schroeder, Indianapolis, Indiana; G. H. Maat Ustick, Spring Valley, Illinois; and a student L. Brunsting of the theological seminary.

Next Friday the congregation hopes to choose one of the two as their pastor. Despite the fact that this congregation has no pastor, there is a good deal of church activity, which is proved by the fact that a choir has just been organized, consisting of twenty-two members. They practise every Friday night.
